General.Name: Xox Networks Bhd
General.Description: Xox Networks Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the event management and communication products distribution businesses in Malaysia. It operates through Information, Communication and Technology (ICT); Event Management; and Financial Solutions segments. The company is also involved in trading of telecommunication products; and distribution and marketing of information, and communication technology. In addition, it provides event and artist management services; stage and event contractions; money lending services; renting of tools and equipment for stage design production; provides ticketing solutions; advertising and maintenance of social media platform; and business management consultancy services, as well as operation of car jockey parking services and restaurants. The company was formerly known as Macpie Berhad and changed its name to Xox Networks Berhad in December 2021. Xox Networks Berhad was founded in 1984 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
